name: Twin Cubes
description:
This game is made for GMTK game jam 2021.

Play this game and dive into the endless world of Twin Cubes! Dodge the spikes and don't die. Easy right?... Let's see how far you can go. 

But remember, whatever you do happens to both of them. These cubes are born together.... and Linked Together!

Controls:

  • W / Up Arrow to move cubes up.
  • S / Down Arrow  to move cubes down.

Music Credit: https://www.chosic.com/
